attributes.action: Put a windfall tax on the price of petrol, fuel oil and diesel over the rate of inflation
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Since the price of oil is now 80% less than the $147 a barrel,the prices to the consumer have not decreased in a perportionate amount to the reduction of the cost per barrel.  Any fuel sold over the rate of inflation allowing the reduction in cost of oil per barrell will be taxed at 100% and the saving reducing the duty on fuel.
